title: Hydrating Facial
description: Designed to replenish moisture and revitalize dry skin, leaving it soft and supple.

title: Deep Cleansing Facial
description: Targets clogged pores and impurities, purifying the skin and preventing breakouts.

title: Anti-Aging Facial
description: Addresses signs of aging such as fine lines and wrinkles, promoting firmer, youthful-looking skin.

title: Brightening Facial
description: Helps to reduce dark spots and uneven skin tone, revealing a radiant complexion.

title: Body Scrub
description: Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells, leaving the skin smooth and rejuvenated.

title: Body Wrap
description: Uses various ingredients like seaweed, or clay to detoxify the body and improve circulation.

title: Hydrating Body Wrap
description: Nourishes and moisturizes the skin deeply, restoring its natural glow and hydration.

title: Cellulite Reduction
description: Targets areas prone to cellulite, using techniques like massage, lymphatic drainage.

title: Swedish Massage
description: A gentle, relaxing massage that uses long strokes, kneading, and circular movements to promote relaxation and improve circulation.

title: Deep Tissue Massage
description: Targets deeper layers of muscles and connective tissue to release chronic tension and knots, providing relief from muscle pain.

title: Hot Stone Massage
description: Incorporates heated stones to provide deep relaxation and relief from muscle tension and pain. The heat helps to relax the muscles.

title: Aromatherapy Massage
description: Combines massage techniques with the use of essential oils to enhance relaxation, reduce stress, alleviate specific ailments or concerns
